-- | Low-level bindings to sophia library
--   
--   Low-level bindings to <a>sophia</a>, an open source, modern, fast
--   key/value store.
@package bindings-sophia
@version 0.1.0

module Bindings.Sophia
type C'sporder = CUInt
c'SPGT :: Num a => a
c'SPGTE :: Num a => a
c'SPLT :: Num a => a
c'SPLTE :: Num a => a
c'SPO_RDWR :: Num a => a
c'SPO_RDONLY :: Num a => a
c'SPO_CREAT :: Num a => a
c'SPO_SYNC :: Num a => a
type Handle = Ptr ()
type Env = Handle
type Db = Handle
type Cursor = Handle
type Flags = Word32
type ErrorCode = CInt
type Key = Ptr ()
type Val = Ptr ()
c'sp_env :: IO Env
c'sp_destroy :: Handle -> IO ErrorCode
c'sp_open :: Env -> IO Db
p'sp_env :: FunPtr (IO Env)
c'sp_error :: Handle -> IO CString
p'sp_destroy :: FunPtr (Handle -> IO ErrorCode)
p'sp_open :: FunPtr (Env -> IO Db)
p'sp_error :: FunPtr (Handle -> IO CString)
c'sp_set :: Db -> Key -> CSize -> Val -> CSize -> IO ErrorCode
p'sp_set :: FunPtr (Db -> Key -> CSize -> Val -> CSize -> IO ErrorCode)
c'sp_get :: Db -> Key -> CSize -> Ptr Val -> Ptr CSize -> IO ErrorCode
c'sp_delete :: Db -> Key -> CSize -> IO ErrorCode
p'sp_get :: FunPtr (Db -> Key -> CSize -> Ptr Val -> Ptr CSize -> IO ErrorCode)
p'sp_delete :: FunPtr (Db -> Key -> CSize -> IO ErrorCode)
c'sp_cursor :: Db -> C'sporder -> Key -> CSize -> IO Cursor
c'sp_fetch :: Cursor -> IO CInt
p'sp_cursor :: FunPtr (Db -> C'sporder -> Key -> CSize -> IO Cursor)
p'sp_fetch :: FunPtr (Cursor -> IO CInt)
c'sp_key :: Cursor -> IO Key
c'sp_keysize :: Cursor -> IO CSize
p'sp_key :: FunPtr (Cursor -> IO Key)
p'sp_keysize :: FunPtr (Cursor -> IO CSize)
c'sp_value :: Cursor -> IO Val
c'sp_valuesize :: Cursor -> IO CSize
p'sp_value :: FunPtr (Cursor -> IO Val)
p'sp_valuesize :: FunPtr (Cursor -> IO CSize)
c'sp_dir :: Env -> Flags -> CString -> IO ErrorCode
type SpCmpF = FunPtr (CString -> CSize -> CString -> CSize -> Ptr () -> IO CInt)
p'sp_dir :: FunPtr (Env -> Flags -> CString -> IO ErrorCode)
c'sp_set_key_comparison :: Env -> SpCmpF -> Ptr () -> IO ErrorCode
c'sp_set_keys_per_page :: Env -> Word32 -> IO ErrorCode
p'sp_set_key_comparison :: FunPtr (Env -> SpCmpF -> Ptr () -> IO ErrorCode)
c'sp_set_gc_enabled :: Env -> CInt -> IO ErrorCode
c'sp_set_gcf :: Env -> CDouble -> IO ErrorCode
p'sp_set_keys_per_page :: FunPtr (Env -> Word32 -> IO ErrorCode)
p'sp_set_gc_enabled :: FunPtr (Env -> CInt -> IO ErrorCode)
c'sp_grow :: Env -> Word32 -> CDouble -> IO ErrorCode
c'sp_set_merge_enabled :: Env -> CInt -> IO ErrorCode
p'sp_set_gcf :: FunPtr (Env -> CDouble -> IO ErrorCode)
c'sp_set_merge_watermark :: Env -> Word32 -> IO ErrorCode
p'sp_grow :: FunPtr (Env -> Word32 -> CDouble -> IO ErrorCode)
p'sp_set_merge_enabled :: FunPtr (Env -> CInt -> IO ErrorCode)
c'sp_get_version :: Env -> Ptr Word32 -> Ptr Word32 -> IO ErrorCode
p'sp_set_merge_watermark :: FunPtr (Env -> Word32 -> IO ErrorCode)
p'sp_get_version :: FunPtr (Env -> Ptr Word32 -> Ptr Word32 -> IO ErrorCode)
